title: Add version
content:
This page explains how to add a version for a product model. 

Prerequisite

Before adding a version for a product model, ensure that the product model is in the Active phase. For the procedure to change the phase of a product model, see the "Change phase of product model" section in the  Product model workflow page.

Add version

You can't add versions for product models of type Category.

To add a version:

  1. Click  > Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Product Versions. This directs you to the Product Versions tab, which displays versions of all product models.
  3. Click New.
  4. Specify the following details:
    Field Description
    Version name The name of the version. 
    Version number The version number. 
    Display label This field is auto-populated, combining the version name and number in the format:  Version name (version number).
    Product model The product model to which the version belongs.
    Type The type of the version. The available options are Major, Minor and Patch.
    Parent version The parent version, if applicable
    Maintenance start date The date from which the version maintenance begins.
    Maintenance end date The date on which the version maintenance ends.
    Description

    The description of the version.
  5. Click SAVE. This redirects you the Product Versions tab. You can see the version record you created.
